reviews.review_msg: Okay so I can't really rate the prof because there wasn't any role of the prof in this course other than providing the recorded lectures. The TA's did all the marking and very really tough graders. The lecture material was heavy and the final exam was in person which was really hard and not related to the knowledge checks that were provided.
Very caring professor and her lectures are interesting too!

Dr. Hedden is very passionate about the Canadian Healthcare System and really cares about her students. She is readily available and willing to provide specific feedback and help with any papers or questions. This course content is different than others and will be helpful to learn about if interested in how healthcare works in Canada.
